solution_line_template: Julio catches a total of {fish_per_hour} fish/hour * {hours_fished} hours = <<{fish_per_hour}*{hours_fished}={total_fish_caught}>>{total_fish_caught} fish.
After losing some of the fish, Julio has {total_fish_caught} fish - {fish_lost} fish = <<{total_fish_caught}-{fish_lost}={remaining_fish}>>{remaining_fish} fish.
